answers.answer: Ugh I can't get it together! I have been diabetic since a teen, normal diabetes stuff I have down pat but this is my second pregnancy and still can't figure it out its so different.
Yea its hard, very strict diet. I miscarried my first baby because i didnt have my diabetes in control. But i did.this time & im 12 weeks & the babys perfectly healthy. Im not even on insulin
Normally I do a really good job controlling it with diet, oral meds, and keeping my weight down but they already had to put me on insulin im only 11weeks
Wow really?  Im 12 weeks and i havent got on any.insulin just dieting n sugar controling

question: Any other type 2 mommies out here that feel my pain?!?!
title: diabetes
